website_summaries.verdict: Cooling and humidifying system w/a large capacity and excellent features. Trade-offs include the large footprint, high price, and frustrations calibrating its functions.
pros: Built-in hygrometer lets you monitor humidity while keeping cigars cool
Spanish cedar drawers and shelves, handsome housing, and 250-cigar capacity
cons: Larger than what some people need
Challenging to get the proper humidity balance, resulting in occasional moisture buildup

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Humidity gauge needle broken and bouncing around in glass. Door bent.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Humidity gauge needle fallen off and bouncing around inside glass. Door bent resulting in no seal.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I received my package with 4 small damages on front aluminum frame
customer_reviews.author: rabih adra

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for about 2 months now. Unit has a hum to it i am thinking is an issue with one of the fans, which means its not going to last very long. The cedar tray/drawer corners were coming apart and I had to re-secure them. I would like to replace the cedar Shelves with the trays/drawers however from NewAir they are $40 each, it would be cheaper to buy a better quality unit that already came with them. So far the unit works, quality control is garbage though, i would consider this purchase a bit of a gamble with your money.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Humidity Good, Temperature, Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: I am keeping and using this product, even though temperature control is awful. Maybe I don’t understand how these things work. The room temperature where I currently keep it low (below 65° F). The device does not “heat” but seems to follow the room temperature. I suspect when summer is finally here, it will keep the temperature around 65° F. Otherwise, it seems well made and works as advertised. The hygrometer is pretty close to dead-on using my calibrated digital hygrometer. Lots of room, too. Inside light is not overly useful as it’s in the “ceiling” and can’t shine through the shelves. I use a flashlight if I want to look inside.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: WARNING moisture build-up and ruined cigars
customer_reviews.text: WARNING. A few others noticed, but moisture builds up in the unit. Crystals can't balance out this type of moisture. I just opened a box of Habanos and ALL LOST to mold! This product is not just poor, it is dangerous to your cigar collection. After inspection, many other, not-cheap, cigars are also infected. I can't imagine that it was actually designed for this purpose - more likely some little fridge thing that they are selling as a humidor - which it is not.
customer_reviews.author: TPS777

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and quiet running.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased after the first week. It arrived well packed and undamaged. No odd smells. The cedar shelves and drawer appear to be good quality considering the price. Runs very quiet. It’s 3 feet from my desk and I don’t notice it. The analog hygrometer is about 3% low from the Xikar digital unit next to it. I’m currently using 3 Xikar gel packs until it gets up to 68%. It’s also roomier inside than I thought it would be. In the picture you can see it handles a box of Jaime Garcia Limited Edition no problem. That’s a big bulky cedar box with thick sides and it’s in there with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Indiefab

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I bought this Humidor on January 2016. The Idea of not adding water frequently Made this an Ideal Humidor., by the beginning of year 2, I started noticing, that it could not keep desired temp, and had to constantly adjust the dial.by year 3, which started on Jan. 2018. it started to work intermittently till its final death-on Nov. 2018. I give it 2 stars for the concept, and one start for the $100 a year value to have a humidor to keep my cigars. I am buying another brand of electric humidor, Hoping to be better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: aabmd59

customer_reviews.title: Took a bit, but now it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Had a problem with humidity but stuffed it with news paper, and washed it with distilled water and boom a perfect 69-69. So far a great product. And get a digital hydrometer, cause the analog doesn't work at all, even after trying to calibrate it with a salt test. Very happy! I don't even need any humidity packs or beads. Ok two months later, I still have the perfect humidity, and no plastic smell or taste! I never have to put distilled water in, but did hook it up to an inkbird temp control because it was all over the place. With the inkbird it runs perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rnbd10305

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product yet
customer_reviews.text: I have this inside my home in a climate controlled bedroom. The ambient temperature of the room is approximately 64 degrees Fahrenheit, but it seems as though I am unable to change the temperature. I may use it only for my flavored cigars and tobacco products.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Frances

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The first one I got was not working at all. The replacement really dosent work either. It never reaches the temperature setting and to make things worse now it make a humming noise so I had to unplug it. So now I basically I just have a regular box.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year . My second one. Both stopped working within a year . Complete waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write review, wanted to see how it holds up. Ok for the price, temperature is always higher or lower than settings, my advice get better quality one and go bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Amateur product. More harm than good.

Used to for about a week before I noticed the humidity going completely whack. Upon closer inspection the back of the inside had moisture droplets and was seeping into the shelves. Clearly that's a deal breaker. It's back in the box and is being returned.

Turns out the hygrometer is glued into place. Going to let it air out, not much I can do about the wood, it soaked up the glue pretty good (forgot to take a picture, will do when it’s done seasoning). One of the shelves was blemished, nothing some sandpaper didn’t fix. Update: It works just fine, no complaints there.

I'm still in the process of seasoning and it's keeping a fairly steady and accurate temperature and humidity is building up steadily. The only reason I won't give it 5 stars is that it's not packaged well enough. Came with a dent in the stainless steel. It's not too bad, not worth replacing it over, but a bit disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. Seasoning right now with eight 84% Boveda ...
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid. Arrived in perfect condition. Seasoning right now with eight 84% Boveda packs for two weeks. Set my internal temperature for 67 degrees. My digital hygrometer and thermometer reads 66.8 degrees. Looking good!

customer_reviews.title: All-Around a Solid Unit!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit. I had a larger NewAir as a humidor, and needed a smaller one for overflow. Very quiet, lightweight and holds humidity perfectly. My active humidifier(hydra) rarely comes on, yet the humidity is properly maintained. The only thing preventing a 5 star is the hygrometer is worthless. It is cheap and was way off. I used a calibration kit, but it still won't accurately read. To be honest I knew I would have to replace it anyway. However, with such a nice unit, they should consider upgrading the hygrometer. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a humidor. The temperature control will eliminate the threat of tobacco beetles infesting your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Belcastro

customer_reviews.title: Has worked well.

customer_reviews.title: Solid humidor at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Maintains humidity levels consistently. I do recommend seasoning the wood and running a few days before adding cigars a few at a time roughly 10-15 depending on size. You will need to monitor and adjust to archive your optimal humidity. Remember your humidor will react no matter how good to the ambient temperature of your room, so adjust accordingly.

product_meta.title: NewAir CC-300 Cigar Cooler, 400 Count, Stainless Steel & Black
product_meta.description:
Size:400 CountThe New Air 400 Count Cigar Humidor is a beautiful way to store and display your cigar collection. Inside the stylish stainless steel casing you'll find Spanish cedar shelving and a digital thermostat that keeps temperatures as cool as 54 degrees. This spacious humidor is ideal for collectors and aficionados who need to keep their cigars protected from the elements in warm climates. Refer instruction manual before use.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The NewAir CC-300 is the perfect storage solution for cost-conscious cigar collectors. Unlike a traditional cigar humidor, this air-tight, thermoelectric cooling cabinet lets you control the storage temperature and protects your precious smokes from heat damage and bug infestations. Spanish cedar drawers and shelves balance the humidity, deter destructive tobacco beetles, and impart a complimentary aroma to your cigars. This stylish, compact unit features two full-sized drawers and four slide-out shelves, enough room for more than 400 cigars. Just add your own humidifier for perfect RH control. The NewAir CC-300 cigar cooler is an attractive accent to your home or office, with a sleek cabinet, naturally finished drawers, and a blue LED light that illuminates the interior. The NewAir CC-300 is quiet and vibration free, and the digital control panel lets you easily set and monitor the interior temperature, so you can rest assured that your cigars are safe and protected!
feature_bullets: 400 Cigar Capacity: With the help of four adjustable shelves and two adjustable drawers, this unit can hold 400 cigars while accommodating all cigar sizes and allowing for both loose and boxed cigars from your collection.

Cooling System: The ultra-quiet and vibration free thermoelectric cooling system enables you to control the temperature of your cigars, allowing you to better protect your collection from cigar beetles and create the perfect temperature-controlled environment.

Built-In Hygrometer: Quickly monitor the relative humidity and temperature with the help of the built-in hygrometer and digital temperature display and, using the push button controls for temperature and included moisture container, manage the RH and temperature for your collection.

Interior LED Lighting: Protecting the internal environment, cool blue LED lighting does not raise the internal temperature of your unit but is provided to allow you to better control how your collection is displayed.
Spanish Cedar Construction: Not only offering an excellent aroma and repelling cigar beetles, the Spanish Cedar drawers and shelving aid in moisture retention and relative humidity regulation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
